We take a break from the silliness of our own government to focus on Canada. AKA the third best country in North America. Mexico at least has Cancun. Canada has a giant nickel in Sudbury. Just sayin'.

In Canada, you can get kicked out of the House of Commons (think Congress, but in Canada) for saying mean things about Prime Minister Justin "I Feel Pretty" Trudeau. His opponent, MP Pierre Poilievre, found this out on Tuesday. Poilievre should consider himself lucky. He only got told to leave, as opposed to being indicted for paying back a bank loan.<
title: Watch: Justin Trudeau's opponent gets yeeted out of Canadian Congress for these mean things he said about Justin Trudeau
